resources:
Football Scores AboutActivity
Settings Test Today Yesterday Tomorrow Share About Share Button
This application gets the Football Matches Score for the Premier League, Seria A, Bundesliga, Primera Division and the Uefa Champions League. All Matches data are acquired from football-data.org free API. All team Logos are acquired from http://hdlogo.wordpress.com/ upon requesting permission from the owner. The original version of this app was created by Yahia Khalid Ibn El Walid Ahmed, and a modified version is given to students in the Udacity Android Nanodegree program. To report any bugs,or suggestions do not hesitate to send a mail to y.k.ibnelwalid@gmail.com.
During the off season, fake data will be added to the app.
This is a widget probably.
